verses.verse: Thou shalt not take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H8088>report<s%>: <S%H7896>put<s%> not thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to be an <S%H2555>unrighteous<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H310>follow<s%> a <S%H7227>multitude<s%> to do <S%H7451>evil<s%>; neither shalt thou <S%H6030>speak<s%> in a <S%H7379>cause<s%> to turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> a <S%H7227>multitude<s%> to wrest <S%H5186>justice<s%>:
neither shalt thou <S%H1921>favor<s%> a <S%H1800>poor<s%> man in his <S%H7379>cause<s%>.

If thou <S%H6293>meet<s%> thine <S%H341>enemy<s%>'s <S%H7794>ox<s%> or his <S%H2543>ass<s%> going <S%H8582>astray<s%>, thou shalt <S%H7725>surely<s%> bring it <S%H7725>back<s%> to him <S%H7725>again<s%>.

If thou <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2543>ass<s%> of him that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> thee <S%H7257>lying<s%> under his <S%H4853>burden<s%>, thou shalt <S%H2308>forbear<s%> to <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H5800>him<s%>, thou shalt surely release it with <S%H5800>him<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H5186>wrest<s%> the <S%H4941>justice<s%> due to thy <S%H34>poor<s%> in his <S%H7379>cause<s%>.

Keep thee <S%H7368>far<s%> from a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%>; and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> and <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H2026>slay<s%> thou <S%H6663>not<s%>: for I will not justify the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> no <S%H7810>bribe<s%>: for a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> <S%H5786>blindeth<s%> them that have <S%H6493>sight<s%>, and <S%H5557>perverteth<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.

And a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> shalt thou not <S%H3905>oppress<s%>: for ye <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H5315>heart<s%> of a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>, <S%H3588>seeing<s%> ye were <S%H1616>sojourners<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H776>land<s%>, and shalt <S%H622>gather<s%> in the increase <S%H8393>thereof<s%>:

but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> year thou shalt let it <S%H8058>rest<s%> and <S%H5203>lie<s%> <S%H34>fallow<s%>, that the poor of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%>: and what they <S%H3499>leave<s%> the <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%>. In like manner thou shalt <S%H6213>deal<s%> with thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and with thy <S%H2132>oliveyard<s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> thy <S%H4639>work<s%>, and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H7673>rest<s%>; that thine <S%H7794>ox<s%> and thine <S%H2543>ass<s%> may have <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of thy <S%H519>handmaid<s%>, and the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>, may be <S%H5314>refreshed<s%>.

And in all things that I have <S%H559>said<s%> unto you take ye <S%H8104>heed<s%>: and make no <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, neither let it be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5921>out<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H7272>times<s%> thou shalt keep a <S%H2287>feast<s%> unto me in the <S%H8141>year<s%>.

The <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shalt thou <S%H8104>keep<s%>: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4150>thee<s%>, at the time appointed in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%> (for in it thou camest <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>); and none shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H7387>empty<s%>:

and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, the <S%H1061>first-fruits<s%> of thy <S%H4639>labors<s%>, which thou <S%H2232>sowest<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H614>ingathering<s%>, at the <S%H3318>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>, when thou <S%H622>gatherest<s%> in thy <S%H4639>labors<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.
Three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> all thy <S%H2138>males<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H2076>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> with leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%>; neither shall the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of my <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H3885>remain<s%> all night until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

The <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1061>first-fruits<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground<s%> thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>. Thou shalt not <S%H1310>boil<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in it <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H2461>milk<s%>.

Behold <S%H7971><s%>, I send an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8104>thee<s%>, to keep thee by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and to <S%H935>bring<s%> thee into the <S%H4725>place<s%> which I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%>.

Take ye <S%H8104>heed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8085>him<s%>, and hearken unto his <S%H6963>voice<s%>; <S%H4843>provoke<s%> him <S%H5375>not<s%>; for he will not pardon your <S%H6588>transgression<s%>: for my <S%H8034>name<s%> is in <S%H7130>him<s%>.

But if thou shalt <S%H8085>indeed<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> all that I <S%H1696>speak<s%>; then I will be an <S%H340>enemy<s%> unto thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and an <S%H6887>adversary<s%> unto thine <S%H6696>adversaries<s%>.

For mine <S%H4397>angel<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>thee<s%>, and bring thee in unto the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>: and I will cut them <S%H3582>off<s%>.

Thou shalt not bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to their <S%H430>gods<s%>, nor <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H6213>them<s%>, nor do after their <S%H4639>works<s%>; but thou shalt <S%H2040>utterly<s%> <S%H2040>overthrow<s%> <S%H7665>them<s%>, and break in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> their <S%H4676>pillars<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and he will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thy <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and thy <S%H4325>water<s%>; and I will <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H4245>sickness<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>thee<s%>.
There shall none cast her <S%H7921>young<s%>, nor be <S%H6135>barren<s%>, in thy <S%H776>land<s%>: the <S%H4557>number<s%> of thy <S%H3117>days<s%> I will <S%H4390>fulfil<s%>.

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H367>terror<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2000>thee<s%>, and will discomfit all the <S%H5971>people<s%> to whom thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> turn their backs unto <S%H6203>thee<s%>.

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1644>thee<s%>, which shall drive out the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, from before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.

I will not drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, lest the <S%H776>land<s%> become <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, and the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> multiply against <S%H7227>thee<s%>.
By <S%H4592>little<s%> and <S%H4592>little<s%> I will drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6509>thee<s%>, until thou be increased, and <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And I will <S%H7896>set<s%> thy <S%H1366>border<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> even unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> unto the <S%H5104>River<s%>: for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and thou shalt drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H3772>make<s%> no <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H430>them<s%>, nor with their gods.

They shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H776>land<s%>, lest they make thee <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H5647>me<s%>; for if thou serve their <S%H430>gods<s%>, it will surely be a snare unto <S%H4170>thee<s%>.
